messages.content: My dad's trying to assist a police officer, and someone started shooting at them!
Where are they now? Can you give me the location?
They're on Russell Farm Road, near the intersection with Copper Mine Road.
Are they still shooting? Is anyone hurt?
I think the officer is down. My dad and another person are trying to help him. The shooter tried to run them over!
Stay calm. I'm sending help right now. Can you see the shooter? What are they driving?
They were in a blue Toyota. I'm not sure where they went.
Alright, help is on the way. Are you in a safe place right now?
Yes, I'm hiding near my car, but I can still see them.
Perfect. Stay hidden and don't make any noise. Officers are en route. Stay on the line with me until they arrive.
Can you see how many people are involved besides your father and the officer?
It looks like just one person was shooting. My dad and another bystander are trying to help the officer.
Understood. Stay as quiet as you can, and please don't hang up.
